'''Viridescent Vigil''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Verdant Strider" [[Tighnari]] ({{Dendro}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table}}

==Trivia==
* The first occurrence of this Wish Series ran alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Hunter's Path]], a weapon tailored to Tighnari's gameplay mechanics.
